name: Casey's Cake Factory
description:
Casey Cake Factory is about a robot name Casey to make a combination of cakes.

Follow the orders on the screen, use machines to create cakes, and deliver the cakes on the platform. But you only got 20 seconds to complete as many orders!

Created for the 20-Second Game Jam - https://itch.io/jam/20-second-game-jam

Controls

W/ASD - Move

E or Left Click - Use Machine

F or Right Click - Remove cake on head
